title: Message Rendering Data
description: Schema for storing the context data required to render a message in Adobe Journey Optimizer

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Rendering Context Map
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: A map of namespace identifiers to stringified JSON representations of context objects used in template rendering and personalization

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Profile Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of profile attributes accessed via the 'profile' namespace in templates

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Offer Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of offer decision information accessed via the 'offer' namespace in templates

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Contextual Attribute Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of context variables for general purpose use

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Properties Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of Journey Optimizer properties and configuration settings for the message

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Decision Policy Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of decision policy information for offer decisioning

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Offer Content Attributes
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of attributes related to offer content

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: URL Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Fragment Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of content fragments that can be inserted into templates

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: External Data Lookup
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of context for external data lookups during rendering

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: URL Support
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Input Schema
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Channel Configuration
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Segment Context
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of URL-related information for link tracking and management

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: CJM Properties
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Stringified JSON of internal properties used by the CJM rendering engine

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Retrieved Entities
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: An array of stringified JSON representations of entities retrieved during dynamic entity hydration

items.description: Stringified JSON representing a retrieved entity's data
